name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the...

quotes.show: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the...
quotes.quote: Love is a delusion. If both have the same delusion, that love becomes real. However... if the feelings of each one is different, that is nothing more than a joke...

quotes.show: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the...
quotes.quote: When a human, gives birth to a child, they give it a form. When they give it a name, they recognize it. And when they raise it in the world, they deepen it's existence.

quotes.show: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru Episode 7: Requiem of the...
quotes.quote: And yet, at the end of the day, we are just like tree leaves dancing in a whirlpool. No matter how we dance, we are only swallowed by the whirlpool and disappear...
